label: Opening Soul
vo_texts: Imagine if your neighbourhood wasn’t just buildings and doors…

label: Vignette — Badminton
vo_texts: Both want a game… | …but end up playing badminton with themselves.

label: Vignette — Commute
vo_texts: They even drive to the same office. Alone. | Wasting time, wasting money.

label: Vignette — Yoga
vo_texts: Together, they could stretch… | Instead… they sit apart.

label: Vignette — Cricket
vo_texts: Looking for a team… | No one to play with.

label: Product — Connect
vo_texts: Nikatam connects neighbours instantly — through shared interests.

label: Product — Activities & Feed
vo_texts: From daily yoga sessions… to one-time cricket matches.

label: Product — Flash Micro‑Features
vo_texts: …and everything else that makes a neighbourhood… neighbourly.

label: Montage — Alive Neighborhood Wide
vo_texts: A community that feels like family again.
